snippet.title: Tales of Fablecraft | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Tales of Fablecraft is a cooperative virtual tabletop RPG set in the vibrant, hopeful world of Mythas. Gather your friends and embark on an adventure with integrated video chat, interactive battlemaps, and incredible digital tools perfect for veterans and the RPG-curious alike.

Tales of Fablecraft officially launches into Early Access on Steam on July 23rd, 2024. We'll see you then, Mages.

===== Wishlist us on Steam =====
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2176900/Tales_of_Fablecraft/?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=070924-rd-yt

===== Join Our Discord =====
https://discord.gg/fablecraft

===== Social Media =====
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/fablecraftgame  
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/fablecraftgame
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@fablecraftgame
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/FablecraftGame
